content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_pot
inventory=[{"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 33, "index": 11}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 3, "index": 39}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft a flower pot, I need to craft bricks first. Bricks require smelting clay balls. The only clay ball in the inventory is at slot 39, so I will smelt that into a free slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 39 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_pot
inventory=[{"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 33, "index": 11}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: I still need more bricks to craft the flower pot, so I will smelt the remaining clay ball at slot 39 into a free slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 39 to slot 13 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_pot
inventory=[{"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 33, "index": 11}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: I still need more bricks to craft the flower pot, so I will smelt the remaining clay ball at slot 39 into a free slot (eg., 14).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 39 to slot 14 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_pot
inventory=[{"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 33, "index": 11}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: Now that I have enough bricks, I can start crafting the flower pot. I will first move the brick at slot 12 to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_pot
inventory=[{"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 33, "index": 11}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: Next, I will move the brick at slot 13 to slot 3 in the crafting grid, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_pot
inventory=[{"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 33, "index": 11}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: Next, I will move the brick at slot 14 to slot 5 in the crafting grid, which is below slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_pot
inventory=[{"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 33, "index": 11}, {"type": "weeping_vines", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: Finally, I can craft the flower pot by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
